sensory_systems.name: Advanced LiDAR and Radar Fusion
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution 3D mapping combined with weather-resistant radar for robust environmental perception. LiDAR utilizes pulsed lasers to measure distances, while radar utilizes radio waves, offering redundancy in adverse conditions.
sensory_systems.technical_specifications: LiDAR: Range 200-500m, Resolution 1cm, Frame Rate 100Hz. Radar: Range 500-1000m, Frequency 77 GHz, Signal-to-Noise Ratio > 30dB.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Localization Accuracy: ± 5cm, Object Detection Accuracy: > 90% (for objects up to 1m)

sensory_systems.name: Hyperspectral Imaging
sensory_systems.description: Captures data across a wide range of wavelengths, enabling detailed analysis of materials and surfaces, crucial for identifying regulatory violations and identifying illicit materials.
sensory_systems.technical_specifications: Spectral Range: Visible – Near-Infrared (NIR), Resolution: 10nm, Spatial Resolution: 10cm x 10cm
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Material Identification Accuracy: > 85% (for common regulatory materials), Anomaly Detection Sensitivity: > 95% (for deviations from expected spectral signatures)

sensory_systems.name: Semantic Sensing & AI-Driven Interpretation
sensory_systems.description: Sensor data combined with AI models that can understand the *meaning* of the data, going beyond raw measurements to interpret contextual information (e.g., a specific shade of gray could indicate a particular chemical compound).
sensory_systems.technical_specifications: AI Model: Deep Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with transformer architecture, trained on large datasets of regulatory documents and sensor data.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Contextual Understanding Accuracy: > 75% (correctly interpreting regulations based on sensor data), Anomaly Severity Assessment: Accuracy within +/- 20% of expert judgment.

sensory_systems.name: Audio Analysis (Sound Event Detection)
sensory_systems.description: AI-powered audio analysis to detect prohibited activities (e.g., unauthorized shipments, equipment operation during restricted hours).
sensory_systems.technical_specifications: Frequency Range: 20Hz – 20kHz, Noise Reduction: Adaptive noise cancellation algorithms, Signal-to-Noise Ratio: > 40dB.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Event Detection Accuracy: > 90% (for predefined regulatory events), False Alarm Rate: < 5%

control_systems.name: Adaptive Robotic Control with Reinforcement Learning
control_systems.description: Robots equipped with advanced control algorithms leveraging reinforcement learning to navigate complex environments, adapt to changing conditions, and perform tasks with minimal human intervention.
control_systems.technical_specifications: Degrees of Freedom: 6-7, Payload Capacity: 10-30kg, Operating Speed: Up to 5m/s.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Task Completion Rate: > 95%, Deviation from Optimal Path: < 1cm.

control_systems.name: Digital Twins for Regulatory Processes
control_systems.description: Virtual representations of facilities and processes, updated in real-time with sensor data, enabling simulation, predictive maintenance, and optimization of compliance strategies.
control_systems.technical_specifications: Simulation Engine: Physics-based simulation with AI-driven predictive modeling.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Simulation Accuracy: Within ± 5% of real-world conditions, Anomaly Prediction Accuracy: > 80%.

control_systems.name: Dynamic Control Systems
control_systems.description: Feedback loops integrating real-time data from all sensors to adjust actions and processes on the fly.
control_systems.technical_specifications: Response Time: < 1 second, Algorithm: PID control with adaptive tuning.

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Robotic Platforms
mechanical_systems.description: Reconfigurable robotic arms and mobile platforms, designed to adapt to diverse inspection environments.
mechanical_systems.technical_specifications: Material: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP), Actuator Precision: ± 0.1mm

mechanical_systems.name: Smart Cameras & Ruggedized Optics
mechanical_systems.description: High-resolution, weatherproof cameras designed for continuous operation in challenging environmental conditions.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Image Quality: Standardized metrics (e.g., PSNR, SSIM), Distortion: < 0.5%.

software_integration.name: AI-Powered Rule Engine
software_integration.description: A centralized system that automatically interprets regulations, identifies relevant compliance requirements, and triggers appropriate actions.
software_integration.technical_specifications: Processing Speed: > 100 transactions per second, Database: NoSQL Database (e.g., MongoDB).
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Rule Matching Accuracy: > 90% (correctly identifying relevant regulations), Response Time: < 100ms.

software_integration.name: Blockchain-Based Audit Trails
software_integration.description: Immutable record of all compliance activities, ensuring transparency, accountability, and preventing manipulation.

software_integration.name: Federated Learning Platform
software_integration.description: Allows multiple entities (e.g., regulatory agencies, companies) to collaboratively train AI models without sharing sensitive data.
software_integration.technical_specifications: Scalable Architecture, Secure Data Sharing Protocols.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Model Performance: Comparable to centrally trained models.
